verses.verse: And <WG2532> Having Entered <WG1684> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Ship <WG4143> He Passed Over <WG1276> And <WG2532> Came <WG2064> To <WG1519> <WG3588> His Own <WG2398> City. <WG4172>

And <WG2532>, Behold, <WG2400> They Brought <WG4374> To Him <WG846> A Paralytic <WG3885> On <WG1909> A Bed <WG2825> Lying; <WG906> And <WG2532> Seeing <WG1492> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> <WG3588> <WG4102> Their Faith <WG846> Said <WG2036> To The <WG3588> Paralytic, <WG3885> Be Of Good Courage, <WG2293> Child; <WG5043> Have Been Forgiven <WG863> Thee <WG4671> <WG3588> <WG266> Thy Sins. <WG4675>
And <WG2532>, Lo, <WG2400> Some <WG5100> Of The <WG3588> Scribes <WG1122> Said <WG2036> In <WG1722> Themselves, <WG1438> This Man <WG3778> Blasphemes. <WG987>

And <WG2532> Perceiving <WG1492> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> <WG3588> <WG1761> Their Thoughts, <WG846> Said, <WG2036> <WG2443> Why <WG2444> Ye <WG5210> Think <WG1760> Evil <WG4190> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG2588> Your Hearts? <WG5216>

<WG5101> For Which <WG1063> Is <WG2076> Easier, <WG2123> To Say, <WG2036> Have Been Forgiven <WG863> Thee <WG4671> <WG3588> Thy Sins, <WG266> Or <WG2228> To Say, <WG2036> Arise <WG1453> And <WG2532> Walk? <WG4043>

<WG2443> But That <WG1161> Ye May Know <WG1492> That <WG3754> Authority <WG1849> Has <WG2192> The <WG3588> Son <WG5207> <WG3588> Of Man <WG444> On <WG1909> The <WG3588> Earth <WG1093> To Forgive <WG863> Sins : <WG266> Then <WG5119> He Says <WG3004> To The <WG3588> Paralytic, <WG3885> Having Arisen, <WG1453> Take Up <WG142> Thy <WG4675> <WG3588> Bed, <WG2825> And <WG2532> Go <WG5217> To <WG1519> <WG3588> House <WG3624> Thy. <WG4675>
And <WG2532> Having Arisen <WG1453> He Went Away <WG565> To <WG1519> <WG3588> <WG3624> His House. <WG846>

<WG1492> And Having Seen <WG1161> The <WG3588> Crowds <WG3793>, Wondered, <WG2296> And <WG2532> Glorified <WG1392> <WG3588> God, <WG2316> Who <WG3588> Gave <WG1325> Authority <WG1849> Such <WG5108> <WG3588> To Men. <WG444>

And <WG2532> Passing <WG3855> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> Thence <WG1564> Saw <WG1492> A Man <WG444> Sitting <WG2521> At <WG1909> The <WG3588> Tax Office, <WG5058> Matthew <WG3156> Called, <WG3004> And <WG2532> Says <WG3004> To Him, <WG846> Follow <WG190> Me. <WG3427> And <WG2532> Having Arisen <WG450> He Followed <WG190> Him. <WG846>

And <WG2532> It Came To Pass <WG1096> At His <WG846> Reclining At Table <WG345> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> House, <WG3614> That <WG2532>, Behold, <WG2400> Many <WG4183> Tax Gatherers <WG5057> And <WG2532> Sinners <WG268> Having Come <WG2064> Were Reclining At Table With <WG4873> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> And <WG2532> <WG3588> <WG3101> His Disciples. <WG846>

And <WG2532> Having Seen It <WG1492> The <WG3588> Pharisees <WG5330> Said <WG2036> <WG3588> <WG3101> To His Disciples, <WG846> <WG1223> <WG5101> With <WG3326> The <WG3588> Tax Gatherers <WG5057> And <WG2532> Sinners <WG268> Eats <WG2068> <WG3588> <WG1320> Your Teacher? <WG5216>

<WG3588> But <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> Having Heard <WG191> He Said <WG2036>, To Them, <WG846> Not <WG3756> Need <WG5532> Have <WG2192> They Who <WG3588> Are Strong <WG2480> Of A Physician, <WG2395> ' But <WG235> They Who <WG3588> Ill <WG2560> Are. <WG2192>

<WG4198> But Having Gone <WG1161> Learn <WG3129> What <WG5101> Is, <WG2076> Mercy <WG1656> I Desire, <WG2309> And <WG2532> Not <WG3756> Sacrifice : <WG2378> Not <WG3756> For <WG1063> I Came <WG2064> To Call <WG2564> Righteous Ones <WG1342> ' But <WG235> Sinners <WG268> To <WG1519> Repentance. <WG3341>

Then <WG5119> Come Near <WG4334> To Him <WG846> The <WG3588> Disciples <WG3101> Of John, <WG2491> Saying, <WG3004> <WG1223> <WG5101> We <WG2249> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Pharisees <WG5330> Do Fast <WG3522> Much, <WG4183> <WG3588> But <WG1161> Disciples <WG3101> Thy <WG4675> <WG3756> Fast Not? <WG3522>

And <WG2532> Said <WG2036> To Them <WG846> <WG3588> <WG2424> Jesus, <WG3361> Can <WG1410> The <WG3588> Sons <WG5207> Of The <WG3588> Bridechamber <WG3567> <WG3996> ' Mourn <WG1909> While <WG3745> ' With <WG3326> Them <WG846> Is <WG2076> The <WG3588> Bridegroom? <WG3566> Will Come <WG2064> But <WG1161> Days <WG2250> When <WG3752> Will Have Been Taken Away <WG522> ' From <WG575> Them <WG846> The <WG3588> Bridegroom, <WG3566> And <WG2532> Then <WG5119> They Will Fast. <WG3522>

<WG3762> But No One <WG1161> Puts <WG1911> A Piece <WG1915> Of Cloth <WG4470> Unfulled <WG46> On <WG1909> <WG2440> An Old Garment : <WG3820> Takes Away <WG142> For <WG1063> <WG3588> <WG4138> Its Filling Up <WG846> From <WG575> The <WG3588> Garment, <WG2440> And <WG2532> A Worse <WG5501> Rent <WG4978> Takes Place. <WG1096>

Nor <WG3761> Put They <WG906> Wine <WG3631> New <WG3501> Into <WG1519> Skins <WG779> <WG3820> <WG1487> Old, <WG1161>, Otherwise <WG3361> Are Burst <WG4486> The <WG3588> Skins, <WG779> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Wine <WG3631> Is Poured Out, <WG1632> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Skins <WG779> Will Be Destroyed; <WG622> But <WG235> They Put <WG906> Wine <WG3631> New <WG3501> The <WG1519> Skins <WG779>, New, <WG2537> And <WG2532> Both <WG297> Are Preserved Together. <WG4933>

<WG5023> These Things <WG846> As He Is Speaking <WG2980> To Them, <WG846>, Behold, <WG2400> A Ruler <WG758> Having Come <WG2064> Did Homage <WG4352> To Him, <WG846> <WG3004> Saying, <WG3754> <WG3588> <WG2364> My Daughter <WG3450> Just Now <WG737> Has Died; <WG5053> But <WG235> Having Come <WG2064> Lay <WG2007> <WG3588> <WG5495> Thy Hand <WG4675> ' Upon <WG1909>, Her, <WG846> And <WG2532> She Shall Live. <WG2198>
And <WG2532> Having Arisen <WG1453> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> Followed <WG190> Him, <WG846> And <WG2532> <WG3588> <WG3101> His Disciples. <WG846>

And <WG2532>, Behold, <WG2400> A Woman <WG1135> Having Had A Flux Of Blood <WG131> Twelve <WG1427> Years, <WG2094> Having Come <WG4334> Behind <WG3693> Touched <WG680> The <WG3588> Border <WG2899> <WG3588> <WG2440> Of His Garment. <WG846>
<WG3004> For She Said <WG1063> Within <WG1722> Herself, <WG1438> If <WG1437> Only <WG3440> I Shall Touch <WG680> <WG3588> Garment <WG2440> His <WG846> I Shall Be Cured. <WG4982>

<WG3588> But <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> Having Turned <WG1994> And <WG2532> Having Seen <WG1492> Her <WG846> He Said, <WG2036> Be Of Good Courage, <WG2293> Daughter; <WG2364> <WG3588> <WG4102> Thy Faith <WG4675> Hath Cured <WG4982> Thee. <WG4571> And <WG2532> Was Cured <WG4982> The <WG3588> Woman <WG1135> From <WG575> <WG3588> <WG5610> That Hour. <WG1565>

And <WG2532> Having Come <WG2064> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> House <WG3614> Of The <WG3588> Ruler, <WG758> And <WG2532> Having Seen <WG1492> The <WG3588> Flute Players <WG834> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Crowd <WG3793> Making A Tumult, <WG2350>

Says <WG3004>, To Them, <WG846> Withdraw, <WG402> Not <WG3756> For <WG1063> Is Dead <WG599> The <WG3588> Damsel, <WG2877> But <WG235> Sleeps. <WG2518> And <WG2532> They Laughed At <WG2606> Him. <WG846>

<WG3753> But When <WG1161> Had Been Put Out <WG1544> The <WG3588> Crowd, <WG3793> Having Entered <WG1525> He Took Hold <WG2902> <WG3588> <WG5495> Of Her Hand, <WG846> And <WG2532> Arose <WG1453> The <WG3588> Damsel. <WG2877>
And <WG2532> Went Out <WG1831> <WG3588> <WG5345> This Report <WG3778> Into <WG1519> All <WG3650> <WG3588> Land <WG1093> That. <WG1565>

And <WG2532> Passing On <WG3855> Thence <WG1564> <WG3588> Jesus, <WG2424> Followed <WG190> Him <WG846> Two <WG1417> Blind Men, <WG5185> Crying <WG2896> And <WG2532> Saying, <WG3004> Have Pity On <WG1653> Us, <WG2248> Son <WG5207> Of David. <WG1138>

<WG2064> And Having Come <WG1161> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> House, <WG3614> Came <WG4334> To Him <WG846> The <WG3588> Blind Men, <WG5185> And <WG2532> Says <WG3004> To Them <WG846> <WG3588> Jesus, <WG2424> Believe Ye <WG4100> That <WG3754> I Am Able <WG1410> This <WG5124> To Do? <WG4160> They Say <WG3004> To Him, <WG846> Yea, <WG3483> Lord. <WG2962>
Then <WG5119> He Touched <WG680> <WG3588> <WG3788> Their Eyes, <WG846>, Saying, <WG3004> According To <WG2596> <WG3588> <WG4102> Your Faith <WG5216> Be It <WG1096> To You. <WG5213>

And <WG2532> Were Opened <WG455> Their <WG846> <WG3588> Eyes; <WG3788> Not <WG2532> Strictly Charged <WG1690> Them <WG846> <WG3588> Jesus, <WG2424>, Saying, <WG3004> See <WG3708> No One <WG3367> Let Know It <WG1097>
<WG3588> But They <WG1161> Having Gone Out <WG1831> Made Known <WG1310> Him <WG846> In <WG1722> All <WG3650> <WG3588> Land <WG1093> That. <WG1565>
<WG846> And As They <WG1161> Were Going Out, <WG1831>, Behold, <WG2400> They Brought <WG4374> To Him <WG846> A Man <WG444> Dumb, <WG2974> Possessed By A Demon. <WG1139>

And <WG2532> Having Been Cast Out <WG1544> The <WG3588> Demon, <WG1140> Spake <WG2980> The <WG3588>, Dumb. <WG2974> And <WG2532> Wondered <WG2296> The <WG3588> Crowds, <WG3793> <WG3004> Saying, <WG3754> Never <WG3763> Was It Seen <WG5316> Thus <WG3779> In <WG1722> <WG3588> Israel. <WG2474>
<WG3588> But The <WG1161> Pharisees <WG5330> Said, <WG3004> By <WG1722> The <WG3588> Prince <WG758> Of The <WG3588> Demons <WG1140> He Casts Out <WG1544> The <WG3588> Demons. <WG1140>

And <WG2532> Went About <WG4013> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> The <WG3588> Cities <WG4172> All <WG3956> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Villages, <WG2968> Teaching <WG1321> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG4864> Their Synagogues, <WG846> And <WG2532> Proclaiming <WG2784> The <WG3588> Glad Tidings <WG2098> Of The <WG3588> Kingdom, <WG932> And <WG2532> Healing <WG2323> Every <WG3956> Disease <WG3554> And <WG2532> Every <WG3956> Bodily Weakness <WG3119> Among <WG1722> The <WG3588> People. <WG2992>

<WG1492> And Having Seen <WG1161> The <WG3588> Crowds <WG3793> He Was Moved With Compassion <WG4697> For <WG4012> Them, <WG846> Because <WG3754> They Were <WG2258> Wearied <WG1590> And <WG2532> Cast Away <WG4496> As <WG5616> Sheep <WG4263> Not <WG3361> Having <WG2192> A Shepherd. <WG4166>

Then <WG5119> He Says <WG3004> <WG3588> <WG3101> To His Disciples, <WG846> The <WG3588> Indeed <WG3303> Harvest <WG2326>, Is Great, <WG4183> <WG3588> But The <WG1161> Workmen <WG2040> Are Few; <WG3641>

Supplicate <WG1189> Therefore <WG3767> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> Of The <WG3588> Harvest, <WG2326> That <WG3704> He May Send Out <WG1544> Workmen <WG2040> Into <WG1519> <WG3588> <WG2326> His Harvest. <WG846>
